-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Convert from other blog engines to Hakyll.
--   
--   Convert from other blog engines to Hakyll.
@package hakyll-convert
@version 0.1.0.0

module Hakyll.Convert.Common
data DistilledPost
DistilledPost :: String -> Text -> Maybe Text -> [Text] -> [Text] -> Text -> DistilledPost
dpUri :: DistilledPost -> String
dpBody :: DistilledPost -> Text
dpTitle :: DistilledPost -> Maybe Text
dpTags :: DistilledPost -> [Text]

-- | Categories are coarser-grained than tags; you might be interested in
--   ignoring tags and just focusing on categories in cases where you have
--   lots of little uninteresting tags.
dpCategories :: DistilledPost -> [Text]
dpDate :: DistilledPost -> Text
instance Typeable DistilledPost
instance Show DistilledPost
instance Data DistilledPost

module Hakyll.Convert.Wordpress

-- | Returns only public posts
readPosts :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe [RSSItem])
distill :: RSSItem -> DistilledPost

module Hakyll.Convert.Blogger

-- | A post and its comments
data FullPost
FullPost :: Entry -> [Entry] -> String -> FullPost
fpPost :: FullPost -> Entry
fpComments :: FullPost -> [Entry]
fpUri :: FullPost -> String

-- | Returns only published posts
readPosts :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe [FullPost])
distill :: FullPost -> DistilledPost
instance Show BloggerEntry
